name: Ghost Run!!!!
description:
Endless Runner Game.  Game has power up's and it keeps you high score so you can compete with your friends to show who is better. You have 3 lives and you can get more. The red bottle's are lives make sure you get them it will help a lot. The game gets harder in time. DO NOT TOUCH THE GREEN GHOST.  The game is very fun.

The game will have mow stuff added soon I hope you enjoy.
